name: sherpa dumpling clutch
notes:
a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog [here][1].

if you’re looking for something high fashion and quick to make, this bag is calling your name! with three sizes included, the sherpa dumpling clutch will elevate any ensemble in an instant. crocheted with boucle yarn around a metal frame, the combination of slouch and structure is pure perfection. available in three sizes. a full video tutorial can be found linked in the pattern.

shop the kit [here][2].

**finished dimensions**
sizes: mini (medium, maxi)
length: 11 (18, 20)”/28 (46, 51)cm
depth: 6.25 (6.25, 7)”/16 (16, 18)cm
height: 6.75 (7.75, 9.5)”/17 (20, 24)cm

**difficulty level**
easy

**skills**
single crochet
working in turned rows and joined turned rounds
making pleats
crocheting onto a purse frame
all patterns are written in standard us terms.
